about_the_game:
DLC "The Great Conquest" is a sect management strategic game mode based on Hero's Adventure: Road to Passion. It is also an attempt made many years ago at the beginning of the Hero's Adventure project. This DLC is mainly for players fond of sect management, and the gameplay is quite different from while not affecting the original game. This DLC is made by the dev team using their leisure time, and it's not bound to the main game. If you are interested in sect management and are willing to treat our team a cup of coffee, please give it a try.

While in a chaotic Jianghu, one sect must strengthen and enhance itself to prevent wars, calm disputes, cleanse evil and unite heroes. In this DLC you will play as a leader of a sect in the same Jianghu of Hero's Adventure: Road to Passion, burdened with the duty to bring prosperity to your sect and pacify the world, so as to embark on a new Jianghu path.

Choose to become one of the 19 sect leaders, and by conquering other sects, you will eventually unify Jianghu and pacify this chaotic world.
